rows.label: tev072801_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev078001_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Mon'barac about the Lifehold.

rows.label: tev078001_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev072801_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Mon'barac if anything is troubling him.

rows.label: tev072801_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Mon'barac about the Lifehold Core.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072801_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Mon'barac about the Lifehold.

rows.label: tev072801_MSG0001
rows.name:
I understand that a multitude of Earth plants are also
being stored in the Lifehold.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072801_MSG0002
rows.name:
As a botanist, I would be delighted to have an
opportunity to study them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072801_MSG0003
rows.name:
I suppose we can only pray that priceless treasure trove
was not among the Lifehold parts destroyed by Goetia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072801_MSG0008
rows.name:
Due to advanced technology and prudent oversight,
this ship is flawless in all aspects but one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072801_MSG0009
rows.name:
Alas, that one aspect is something of a deal-breaker
to we Orphe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072801_MSG0010
rows.name:
...What is it, you ask? It's that this is the only plant
that exists on the entire ship![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072801_MSG0011
rows.name:
This is completely insufficient to meet our dietary needs.
We have no choice but to disembark to New LA and
seek out appropriate foliage there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072801_MSG0025
rows.name:
It's certainly nice that you will be able to resurrect your
fallen if you should locate your Lifehold Core.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072801_MSG0026
rows.name:
But I understand that, as of yet, there are a great
many dead humans you still have to revive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072801_MSG0027
rows.name:
Consider we Orphe, who are able to regrow entire
limbs much like the shoots of zesian fleawort that
abound on this planet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072801_MSG0028
rows.name:
Wouldn't you agree that our bodies are far more
practical?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072801_MSG0029
rows.name:
Well, to be fair, they are so pitifully frail that we
are useless in combat, but still...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072801_MSG0034
rows.name:
Now that you've found the Lifehold Core, will you be
ceasing your search for the remaining Lifehold parts?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072801_MSG0035
rows.name:
I must admit that I'm curious to learn as much as I can
about the world from which you hail.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072801_MSG0036
rows.name:
As your Lifehold is a repository for information about
Earth, I hope you will allow me to study its archives.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072801_MSG0037
rows.name:
I understand there are still pieces to be found,
so I hope you will recover them in all due haste.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072801_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072801_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Mon'barac about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072801_MSG0014
rows.name:
I have learned a great many things from you and
Naza.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072801_MSG0015
rows.name:
All xenoforms, no matter their shape, possess something
that is as vital to them as our Ovah.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072801_MSG0016
rows.name:
I believe that must be true of you humans as well.
Surely you possess something that's as precious to
you as life itself?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072801_MSG0017
rows.name:
If so, I hope that when next we speak, you'll tell me
what it is. I want to understand more about you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072801_SEL2021
rows.name: Ask Mon'barac about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072801_MSG0018
rows.name:
When I saw Yun'tonam get assaulted by Naza,
I felt strangely...envious.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072801_MSG0019
rows.name:
What could such an emotion possibly mean?
What has happened to me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072801_MSG0020
rows.name:
Perhaps something disturbing has begun to sprout
within me.[ST:wait ]
